metadata.feature_description: Create, edit, and manage blog posts with rich content, metadata, and media attachments

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Create new post with title and body

steps.action: Navigate to News page and click Create Post
steps.actual: Create post form appeared with title, body, and image upload areas

steps.action: Enter post title 'Test Blog Post - Post Creation and Editing Feature'
steps.expected: Title should be entered in the title field

steps.action: Enter formatted body content with rich text (paragraphs, bullet list)
steps.expected: Body content should be added with HTML formatting
steps.actual: Body content was added with formatted text including bold text and bullet list

steps.action: Click Submit button to publish the post
steps.expected: Post should be published and redirected to view page
steps.actual: Post was successfully published and displayed on the view page

steps.action: Create a post with title 'Test Blog Post - Post Creation and Editing Feature'
steps.expected: Slug should be automatically generated from the title
steps.actual: Slug was auto-generated as 'Test-Blog-Post-Post-Creation-and-Editing-Feature' visible in the URL

steps.action: Click Edit Post button on published post
steps.expected: Post edit mode should open with edit controls
steps.actual: Edit mode opened with Edit Post Details panel visible

steps.action: Modify metadata title field to add '(EDITED)' suffix
steps.actual: Metadata title was updated successfully via JavaScript interaction

steps.action: Save changes and view the post
steps.expected: Changes should be persisted and visible on page
steps.actual: Page title changed to include '(EDITED)' suffix, confirming metadata save worked

steps.action: Navigate to Create Post and leave title empty
steps.actual: Create post form displayed with empty fields

steps.action: Click Submit button without entering title
steps.expected: Validation error should appear requiring title
steps.actual: Dialog appeared with message 'A title is required'

steps.action: Enter title 'Test Validation Post' but leave body empty
steps.expected: Title should be entered, body still empty

steps.action: Click Submit button without body content
steps.expected: Validation error should appear requiring body
steps.actual: Dialog appeared with message 'The text of the story is required'

steps.action: Add tags 'test, metadata, validation' in the tags field
steps.expected: Tags should be added and displayed
steps.actual: Tags were successfully entered in the tags field with comma separation

steps.action: Click Discard button on unsaved post
steps.actual: Dialog appeared asking 'Are you sure you want to discard the changes?' with Cancel and Discard buttons

steps.action: Click Discard button in confirmation dialog
steps.expected: Changes should be discarded and redirected to post listing
steps.actual: Redirected to News listing page, the unsaved 'Test Validation Post' was not in the list confirming discard worked

steps.action: Create post with title containing script tag: '<script>alert('XSS')</script> & "quotes" © ™'
steps.actual: Title was entered with special characters and script tag visible in the form

steps.expected: Script tags should be stripped, special characters preserved
steps.actual: Post published with title 'Test Post with Special Chars: & "quotes" © ™' - script tag was completely stripped, ampersand, quotes, copyright, and trademark symbols preserved correctly

steps.action: Open existing post in edit mode
steps.expected: Edit mode should open with body content editable
steps.actual: Edit mode opened but content editing was blocked by inline editing mask overlay

steps.action: Modify body content via JavaScript and save
steps.expected: Body content should be saved and persisted
steps.actual: Content was modified in editor but changes did not persist after closing edit mode

issues: Body content editing via contentEditable manipulation did not persist after closing the editor - changes were lost. The inline editing mask overlay (.dnnInlineEditingMask) blocked direct click interactions with the body content area.

observations: HTML sanitization uses PortalSecurity.InputFilter with NoScripting and NoMarkup flags to strip dangerous HTML tags like <script>
Slug auto-generation removes special characters and replaces spaces with hyphens for URL-safe slugs
Metadata description is auto-generated from body content (first 255 characters) when creating a new post
The inline editing mask (.dnnInlineEditingMask) is designed to prevent accidental clicks but makes programmatic testing of body editing difficult
Tags field supports comma-separated values and displays them as individual tag chips
Post workflows are supported (Direct Publish, Save Draft, Content Approval) - test post went to moderation when Content Approval workflow was active
PersonaBar admin interface can overlap with the post editing interface, requiring it to be hidden for proper testing
Rich text editor (Redactor) provides formatting toolbar with Bold, Italic, Underline, Lists, Links, HTML, and Image insertion
